cells.m_text_in:
# TODO LIST
linux
	project system not functional - DirExists?
AC plugins
	tex ref
	bash
	js member name in certain strings
	--
	multi-source combination
		some candidates may smash a context
		put this in as a property of the candidates
get rid of opensans - fontconfig
file association
multiple tabs for the same file
	private sel / scroll
	use circled numbers for id?
cell-making shouldn't rewrite the text if the cell is already there
(test) IME: location still bad
	may need to set windows caret
	try size 0 caret? not possible
ctrl+mousewheel
	per-tab scale? make it global
mouse centric interaction
	toolbar in menu bar
	restore button
localization, theme
drag-out support
	secondary windows
ctrl+g mode
	goto button to trigger it on the tophint
	need must-appear
short and simple theme color palette
put plugins in ~/.qpad
linux
	"make install" package
make top hint / notification dodge 
	MouseOver / cursor
swap ctrl+shift+v and ctrl+v?
find mode scrolling
	don't autoscroll on every render
	scroll bar
	wheel
binary editor reloading?
F1 help plugin
	directly go to the function page instead of google
		node, ...
	could also provide AC
for() is not a function
fileindex gc vs parse queue
reparse should invalidate AC
fold buttons
mac
	tooltip hotkey translation, zoom hotkey
mac application menu
rendering
	true AA for roundrect
git diff viewer
auto-include files
tex
	port more of deferred.qpadscript
	enabling/disabling plugins in menu
CJK PPM:
	work in conjunction with IME?
		could have blind prediction...
	iphone prediction isn't that useful
(test) exe icon, removed 20x20
very narrow file list...
bad parser result after multiple saves
	could be diff tracker bug
binary editor
	duk buffer size limit
